entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 then becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
